name: UGG Turlock Waterproof Boots - Children to Youths
description: Take on winter slush and snowdrifts with warm and dry feet. With the thick fleece lining and a fully waterproof construction, the Turlock boots are ready to wake on winter's worst. The quick-pull and zipper combination are easy to pull on so little ones can get out to the snow quicker.Waterproof suede is fully seam-sealed for weather protection.Fleece lining and thick sheepskin sockliner keep feet warm.Polyurethane toe guard and heel counter add durability to high wear areas.Quick-pull laces with side zipper.EVA insole adds cushioning underfoot.Flexible rubber outsole provides grip on slippery terrain.
